meanings.definition: The use of drugs to prevent disease
meanings.sent1: Chemoprophylaxis can help stop illnesses before they start.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend chemoprophylaxis to keep people healthy.
meanings.sent3: Taking chemoprophylaxis is like having a shield against sickness.
meanings.sent4: Chemoprophylaxis acts as a protective barrier against harmful infections.
meanings.sent5: The concept of chemoprophylaxis is like having a superhero power to fight off diseases.

meanings.definition: The administration of medication to prevent the development of a disease
meanings.sent1: Proper chemoprophylaxis involves following a prescribed medication schedule.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided chemoprophylaxis to all patients to avoid complications.
meanings.sent3: Using chemoprophylaxis is like building a fortress against potential illnesses.
meanings.sent4: Chemoprophylaxis is the key to locking out diseases from taking hold.
meanings.sent5: The importance of chemoprophylaxis cannot be overstated in maintaining good health.
